title: Russian Euro ads banned
content:
Submitted by [Jared Benson](http://web.archive.org/web/20090714061708/http:/typophile.com/user/3 "View user profile.") : 1.Oct.2003 11.41am 

Not sure what the message is here, but apparently there's at least one Russian designer who feels the Euro and Dollar need to take their relationship to "that next level".   
   
 [http://www.ananova.com/news/story/sm\_822534.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20090714061708/http:/www.ananova.com/news/story/sm_822534.html)   
   
Thanks, Andrew, for the scoop.
author: Jared Benson
